mapper.select: SELECT a.std_id, a.tch_id, a.saving_id, s.saving_name, a.rate, a.deposit_amount, a.start_date, a.end_date, a.total_amount FROM saving_account a join saving s on a.saving_id = s.saving_id WHERE std_id = #{stdId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saving_account (std_id,tch_id, saving_id, rate, deposit_amount, start_date, end_date, status, total_amount) VALUES (#{stdId},#{tchId}, #{savingId}, #{rate}, #{depositAmount}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 'y', 0)

INSERT INTO saving (product, rate, saving_content, target, deposit_period, deposit_cycle, max_deposit, prime_rate, prime_job) VALUES (#{product}, #{rate}, #{savingContent}, #{target}, #{depositPeriod}, #{depositCycle}, #{maxDeposit}, #{primeRate}, #{primeJob})
